TopicTitle: [0.24] Bargain Rocket Parts v1.1 - Bust out the duct tape, we're going to space!

Articles.Content:
[KSP] New Pawnington 9: The Second Coming of the Hergard

Bill Kerman needs to be saved! And after the baptism we should probably recover him from orbit, too.

Welcome KAS to the modpack!

[KSP] New Pawnington 10: Peeing on the Mun

Bill's been holding it. Ever see a Kerbal write his name in Mun dust?

A Bargain Rockets (KAS assisted) Mun landing.

Hey, I need some help with this mod. I tried using the cardboard box for a capsule but it seems like when I try to use it I have no crew to fly it. Here is an example http://cloud-4.steampowered.com/ugc/39726630772668961/9550E1578D19E895F0A7A1862A3A31ED41B73326/

[KSP] New Pawnington 11: Kerbal Entertainment Systems

In an effort to increase morale, I'm installing a recreation area off the back of the Space Center.

What do you mean, "waste of resources?"
Still the most Kerbal spirited MOD!
My god A FLYINIG BBQ!! IGN 10/10

How have I not seen this until now?

Gr8 m8 I r8 8/8

These should be the starting pieces in the stock game!

(or at least edit a tech tree so they come in before other things)

Nah, too much trouble
Too bad there was never a .25 update made. Some super-cheap rockets might be nice for those times when you waste all your funds in a series of horrible accidents.

Too bad there was never a .25 update made. Some super-cheap rockets might be nice for those times when you waste all your funds in a series of horrible accidents.

Should work fine in 0.25, considering these don't use any special plug-ins.

I love this!.... I have so much smiling and laughing to do now I have this

top stuff!!!

I love this!.... I have so much smiling and laughing to do now I have this

top stuff!!!

Some of the objects in this mod are technically steampunk. The Bell-nozzle engine, for instance.
I have made a new thread as I am now maintaining this mod: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/101335-%280-25%29-Bargain-Rocket-Parts-1-3-Snacks%21?p=1564405#post1564405

FYI - in all of my testing the bits look to work as-is.

You will however need to update Module Manager to the latest version for the alternate tech tree to work in career.

If anyone has experienced any other weirdness and wants to help be a second set of eyes let me know Positive reports (i.e. nothing broke in 0.25) help as well.

I have added a new version (1.1.1) to the USI dropbox.

The only change I had to do was update the MM version to something current.

Given that there is not a material change needed, I'll be refraining from starting a new thread till 0.90 (and at that point I will ensure everything still works before doing so).

There's been an undue amount of drama on this particular mod. So to be perfectly clear, my intent is purely to keep an eye on this from a support standpoint and make sure it remains compatible with upcoming KSP versions until such time as the OP returns so I can hand them back a fully functional mod. In my estimation that's the best way to respect the work of the OP and to prevent this bit of mod goodness from falling into disrepair.

We can continue to use this thread for support requests until 0.90 (which given it's in experimentals is right around the theoretical corner) at which point I'll post a new link along with an updated download (if necessary). I'll likely do a new thread regardless, just because the KSP version number in the OP may confuse people if it's 0.90 compatible but the thread says 0.24.

I have added a new version (1.1.1) to the USI dropbox.

Again, it is I, the never tiring CKAN and kerbalstuff advocate

Could I ask you to put your version on kerbalstuff? Preparing packaging while looking forward for 0.90, of course

Again, it is I, the never tiring CKAN and kerbalstuff advocate

Could I ask you to put your version on kerbalstuff? Preparing packaging while looking forward for 0.90, of course

I'll put it on GitHub since CKAN can hit that as well, and add in KSP-AVC support.
Cool, thank you

Works fine in 0.90

Bundle on the USI dropbox (link in my sig) works as bundled, though I did tweak the ZIP folder to have a GameData folder.

Will start a new thread once the dust settles as I have a dozen mods to update

I love that this somehow goes BEYOND merely being Kerbal.

These are the parts that the Rabbid Space Program would use!
